amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of the text of amendments numbered 2, 4, 6, 10, 12, 14, 23, 27, 28, and 29 printed on pages H3496-H3498 in the Congressional Record for March 22, 1995.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of the following amendments printed in House Report 104-85, offered en bloc: Nos. 2 (Talent), 4 (Hyde), 6 (Talent), 104 (Smith TX), 12 (Burton), 14 (Cunningham), 23 (Roberts), 27 (Zimmer), 28 (Shaw), 29 (Dunn).

action.text: Archer amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent. Technical modifications to the Hyde and Burton amendments.
On agreeing to the Archer amendments (A002) as modified Agreed to by recorded vote: 249 - 177 (Roll no. 258).
